availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Dallas (Nicholas County, KY, saddler)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married Cynthia Gardner Dallas on January 20, 1846 in Nicholas County. Father of Alonzo Dallas, Marion Dallas, John Dallas, Charles Dallas, Franklin Dallas, and Elizabeth Dallas. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1860. Saddler in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 275
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 137A
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #000252392, p. 83
Find A Grave, "John M. Dallas (1820-1875)," Memorial #116383950, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116383950 (accessed November 27, 2019).
